reviews.name: Bogie & Bacall: The Signature Collection
reviews.reviewText: What can I say about Bogie that hasn't already been said? If you like him, you will certainly enjoy this box-set. Great value for the price.
reviews.title: Awesome

reviews.name: Bogie & Bacall: The Signature Collection
reviews.reviewText: Being a huge Bogart/Bacall fan I was thrilled to finally get all their movies in one boxed set. Never paid much attention to the movie critics review, I judge for myself, this set took me back in time, to an era I so wished I could have grown up in.
reviews.title: See the magic for yourself!

reviews.name: Bogie & Bacall: The Signature Collection
reviews.reviewText:
Bogart and Bacall----Was there ever a better pair???
Love all the movies. Watch them every time on tv. Now I can watch whenever I want
reviews.title: Great set of movies

reviews.name: Bogie & Bacall: The Signature Collection
reviews.reviewText: Hard to belive the low price of this collection. The films are classics and the chemistry between Bogart and Bacall is electric.My personal favorite is Key Largo. Amust buy for Bogie fans.
reviews.title: outstanding collection

reviews.name: Bogie & Bacall: The Signature Collection
reviews.reviewText: These are some of the best movies by this couple. I looked for these movies soon after Bacall passed away. They were sold out at other web sites but Walmart had the best price and delivered free to my local Walmart. Delivered to my store on the day promised!
reviews.title: Great combination of Bogart and Bacall movies.
